https://tmrev.io/movie/721919-(F)our Seasons 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xw5fQ7yc34Db5dmNOx8sfR71tBy.jpg Throughout the four seasons of the year, these four stories are just a simple glimpse through the life of four couples that meet, live, split and meet again in the cities of Madrid, Chicago and New York. The different stages of a relationship in a voyeuristic exercise, embodied in a wide range of couples and set in different cities of the world. (F)our Seasons
